divs: sighting detailsit does not fit into astrology or the satellite tracker website. i watch all the bible movies and i think that star of bethlehem was more of a medical ship. mechanics + electronics + medical philosophies = freedom of time. i smoke so take a leather bendable case lined by cleanable glass with tiny metal chains allowing it to bend. use brushes to enter the inner lungs and retract cleaning them out as many times as you like and returning to theyre shell case after cleaning out the glass insides. use a tiny vaccumm attached and attach the tubes to the butthole. im suprised that we cannot all team up together to solve these medical issues. i also see that mechanics\computers were first neccessary to avoid the cloning of babies and unreliable parts. imagine what the world could do for medical science if we all teamed our heads up together and philosophized mechanics\electronics\nature . one cut down the chest and stomach in one computer package with adjustable tubes will become one day. i think that god wants us to make a commitment and fall in love with our man our wife, they sure like to make cheeseburgers and squish the meat with theyre bare hands. i think that we are putting god in a snake trance and making it difficult to move on. i also believe that revelation meant the second coming was a 144,000 2000 year recall of gods friends from hell and the ocean when they were walking grass snakes \ falcons or whatever else they were before they escaped the ocean. 144,000 people? everyone has to be proud and take what they got black , white, asian, or muslim. i see jesus reading a big book of medical sciences , philosophies and mechanics in vision, but i beleive that only recently was the solor cult liberty by jelousy, fear and excuses. well im back to the history channel now about the end of the world. love god the father, ]cms\tg\pid]
